g:HTMLPanel.p: The Editor chapter shows how to use the different types of editors and drivers in the editor framework. This demo shows some of them in action

Employees example - This is a simple example where SimpleBeanEditorDriver has been used to edit and flush data into a simple Employee class. The example uses the Editor type to manipulate the backing object.
Phone book example - This example uses SimpleBeanEditorDriver. The examples uses No-arg method defined editor.
Contacts - This example uses RequestFactoryEditorDriver, to manipulate contact data, this is based on the earlier requestfactory example. The examples uses ValueAwareEditor, ListEditor and Editor.
List contacts - This example uses RequestFactoryEditorDriver to list all contacts created in the Contacts example. This example shows how to use Adapters.
List contacts 2 - This example uses RequestFactoryEditorDriver to list all contacts created in the Contacts example. This example shows how to use CompositeEditor and other Editor types.
